title: Question:
author: hilariousandco
content: QuoteTyson Fury confirms next fight against former UFC champion Francis Ngannou in Saudi Arabia on October 28"As soon as that bell goes, it’ll be bombs away!" Tyson Fury confirms he will face former UFC champion Francis Ngannou in a fight under the official rules of professional boxing, with three judges ringside adopting the 10-point must systemhttps://www.skysports.com/boxing/news/12183/12918868/tyson-fury-and-francis-ngannou-set-date-for-exhibition-boxing-match-in-saudi-arabia

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: I was wondering how this could happen but I now understand after reading Ngannou's flexible contract with PFL. This is probably the biggest payday in his career so good job to his manager or promoter for making it happen.I can see it's the similar 10-point system but there's no mention of the number of rounds. I think Tyson will fight smart and play the long game since Francis doesn't have enough tank.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: This is one of the best news I saw today!I wanted to see Fury vs Ngannou ever since they started talking about this fight, especially after Ngannou left UFC.There is one guy who is going to hate this fight and that is Dana White, he desperately tried to cancel this fight and arrange Fury to fight against Jon Jones, but sorry Dana you are a loser  If I had to pick a winner now I would say Fury is going to win, but I want to see odds first, and Ngannou can knock down Fury, but he showed he can survive that before.I really hope they all stay heathy and ready for this fight.Tweet from Ngannou:QuoteNever doubt a man with hope and faith.https://twitter.com/francis_ngannou/status/1678768219480547330

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: This is boxing. Tyson Fury is a boxer. Francis Ngannou is a MMA fighter. Who is going to win? Tyson Fury is just still the superior while Francis Ngannou do not have boxing skills, he will just train for it, although there is time for that but I see him as the underdog.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: It's been popping up in the social media sports pages I'm following and I thought it was just all rumors and now it's finally happening, this is going to be a fight to find out who's the "Baddest Man on the Planet" since this is boxing, Fury will be the big favorite to win the fight he knows how to use the ring wisely and Ngannou will have to rely on his power, this is a very exciting fight to watch and Ngannou is making a lot of money here, much more than what he earned on his entire fights during his stint in UFC.I'm sure there is going to be a lot of hype and thrash talk here, there's always have when Fury is involved.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: It doesn't look like it's final already and they call this an exhibition fight also, it will leave some doubts that this is just kind of a rigged game.  But this is what Ngannou has been hoping though, just some boxing match with the most renowned boxers on the planet and huge pay. Too early to say but he may really get it and Dana his best friend may just as well congratulate him. It's very possible that Ngannou can KO Tyson. If he can't then he will really have to prepare to last for at least 5 rounds. If he can survive at least 5 rounds it's not very shameful.

comments.author: LFC_Bitcoin
comments.body: This fight is only going to end up one way and that’s with Fury beating Ngannou badly. It never ends up well for MMA fighters in the boxing ring.Fury is 1.1 betting odds favourite for a reason.I wonder how many rounds there will be, I’m thinking 10.Somebody post sportsbet.io odds for the fight in this thread when you see them.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on July 11, 2023, 03:10:45 PMThis is boxing. Tyson Fury is a boxer. Francis Ngannou is a MMA fighter. Who is going to win? Tyson Fury is just still the superior while Francis Ngannou do not have boxing skills, he will just train for it, although there is time for that but I see him as the underdog.We saw fights of such even if it involved some celebrities but still we cannot change the fact that the one who is in his 'house' would more likely win. Tyson Fury has the advantage simply because boxers are used of running 12 rounds while fighting their opponents, there is a huge difference with stamina especially if the 'outsider' has nothing much of an experience to be in 12 rounds straight not to mention that fury himself is a hard hitter which would make it harder for Ngannou to stay in shape during the match. Ngannou is a great player in MMA but whoever exits his cave would be at the disadvantage.

comments.author: eaLiTy
comments.body: Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on July 11, 2023, 04:34:44 PM~This fight is only going to end up one way and that’s with Fury beating Ngannou badly. It never ends up well for MMA fighters in the boxing ring.Francis Ngannou will gas out completely after the 4th or 5th round and Tyson Fury will teach him some classic boxing lessons for someone who is making his boxing debut against a legend  . Great to see that Francis Ngannou was finally able to get a match up he is dreaming and after the fight he will understand why Dana White was not willing to make this fight happen  .

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: eaLiTy on July 11, 2023, 05:30:35 PMQuote from: LFC_Bitcoin on July 11, 2023, 04:34:44 PM~This fight is only going to end up one way and that’s with Fury beating Ngannou badly. It never ends up well for MMA fighters in the boxing ring.Francis Ngannou will gas out completely after the 4th or 5th round and Tyson Fury will teach him some classic boxing lessons for someone who is making his boxing debut against a legend  . Great to see that Francis Ngannou was finally able to get a match up he is dreaming and after the fight he will understand why Dana White was not willing to make this fight happen  .Dana even prevented this fight to happen by matching Jon Jones vs Fury, you can imagine how furious he would be hearing this news. Francis took the risk of not signing another contract from UFC and got the PFL contract and this dream boxing fight but this is somewhat of a mismatch that Francis could terribly lose. Fury had been boxing since he was a kid, you can't just jump in and kickass someone like that. He needs a really good team to train him well while there is a long time to train. I can say that Fury also chooses to fight Francis over Jones.  Cherry-picking or not, he gave Francis one chance of a lifetime and Francis will be forever grateful to Fury.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on July 11, 2023, 03:10:45 PMThis is boxing. Tyson Fury is a boxer. Francis Ngannou is a MMA fighter. Who is going to win? Tyson Fury is just still the superior while Francis Ngannou do not have boxing skills, he will just train for it, although there is time for that but I see him as the underdog.Yes, but there are still hype around this fight though. Maybe what people want is how Francis can be at boxing because of the power he shows in the MMA. But as you have, Tyson is a boxer and so he has all the tools to offset the power that Francis possesses.Fury was able to withstand Wilder's knockout punch, he went to the canvass and was able to recover in the first fight. But in the second he adjusted so well that Fury's can't hit him clean. In paper this is good, but Tyson is more superior, but good for Francis, as he will get his biggest pay.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: Dave1 on July 11, 2023, 09:23:26 PMQuote from: Oshosondy on July 11, 2023, 03:10:45 PMThis is boxing. Tyson Fury is a boxer. Francis Ngannou is a MMA fighter. Who is going to win? Tyson Fury is just still the superior while Francis Ngannou do not have boxing skills, he will just train for it, although there is time for that but I see him as the underdog.Yes, but there are still hype around this fight though. In paper this is good, but Tyson is more superior, but good for Francis, as he will get his biggest pay.No doubt, bookies will favor Fury when it comes to odds. He has the advantage when it comes to boxing.We will see if Francis is up to boxing, he may discover that he will like this sports and may continue later on.At least, get some money out of this before he is out of any sports. But Tyson should be cautious about the power punch from Ngannou.He can be knock out if he is not careful inside the ring. Remember, upsets can happen all the time.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: I've seen Tyson Fury fight a few times and he's always a lot of fun to watch, but I don't think I can say I've ever seen Francis fight before.  I'm curious if anyone who's been a big boxing fan for a long time can tell me, are any of these recent heavyweights anything like the heavyweight studs from back when (Tyson, Evander, Lennox Lewis, Foreman, of course Ali etc)?I kinda stopped watching closely because for many years it had seemed that they were simply nothing comparatively.  A buddy of mine, natu visinia, was a pretty solid heavyweight so I would watch his fights, but he was just too old at the time to be great as he fought UFC before boxing. Otherwise no heavyweight has just really grabbed my eye.  Will we ever see one of those again?

comments.author: robelneo
comments.created_time: July 11, 2023, 10:10:19 PMLast edit: July 12, 2023, 12:02:57 AM by robelneo
comments.body: It's finally happening I just knew it was going to happen after the Usyk negotiation collapsed, Joshua and another Wilder fight are not attractive and profitable, he's been talking about this option and Ngannou is very much willing to sit down and have it done, both fighters have very long inactivity but that doesn't mean that both fighters cannot give us an entertaining fight.  I'm sure Fury will get the biggest share of the deal since he is the champion and the one that will attract attention since this is a boxing match Fury will be the overwhelming favorite because Ngannou's expertise inside the ring is more on grappling and he lacks ring generalship in boxing because we all know MMA fighters are flatfooted.I can't wait to see the media promotion it is going to be Fury all over and will do all the talking just like he always does in all his previous fights

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Yeah, not surprised about this fight, when Usyk vs Fury negotiations collapses, sooner or later Tyson will have to look for a dance partner. But there are a lot of criticism about this fight though, specially that we all know that this is just a mismatch fight and Fury will have a lot of fun playing with Francis in this fight. And it can be considered as just another exhibition match, as it is a known boxer against a former MMA fighter. And we haven't seen a MMA fighter beat a decent and very highly skilled boxer. Only way for Francis is to win but one hail mary shot.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Kinda hoping that they're doing Usyk and Fury, though I guess that it's really far from reality right now that Ngannou accepted the Fury match. I have high hopes for Ngannou to last the whole ordeal against a heavy hitter like Fury. The guy's jaw is hard as hell, and he's also one of the more capable boxers in the MMA world right now. Though that's the case, my bet will be on Fury winning this match fairly easily.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: dothebeats on July 11, 2023, 10:43:59 PMKinda hoping that they're doing Usyk and Fury, though I guess that it's really far from reality right now that Ngannou accepted the Fury match. I have high hopes for Ngannou to last the whole ordeal against a heavy hitter like Fury. The guy's jaw is hard as hell, and he's also one of the more capable boxers in the MMA world right now. Though that's the case, my bet will be on Fury winning this match fairly easily. If its an MMA type of match Ngannou can easily pin Fury and choked him but since this is a boxing match where all the rules of boxing are applied I don't think Francis will have a chance to beat Fury, Ngannou agreed to the fight because he wants to make a lot of money and this is a trend right now MMA fighters shifting to boxing for more money, this is going to be entertaining and a real fight as both fighters are badest in their respective field, I hope Ngannou will get a good trainer who specializes in boxing.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: Sometimes, I wonder what's wrong with MMA fighters who think they can compete against boxing champions simply because they have strong punches. Much respect to the sports of MMA, but since this is going to be a boxing match, Ngannou will be schooled. He should have chosen some weaker heavyweights instead. I think he couldn't even defeat Joshua. But, well, this is where the larger money is. Anyway, the odds this early show Fury as the huge favorite at 1.25. Ngannou, on the other hand, is the underdog at 4.00. I couldn't agree with those odds more.

comments.author: Sanitough
comments.body: It seems like an exhibition fight. I checked Fury's record on https://boxrec.com/en/box-pro/479205, but that specific fight was not listed, perhaps it hasn't been updated yet. Regardless, I believe this fight will be a one-sided beatdown dominated by Fury. Ngannou is primarily a UFC fighter, and they will be competing under the rules of boxing, where Fury is currently considered the best in his division though maybe not officially since Usyk owned 3 belts in the same division.

comments.author: FinneysTrueVision
comments.body: At heavyweight there is always a possibility of a fluke knockout. Ngannou will certainly have a puncher's chance. Fury is much bigger in size and also a lot more skillful inside a boxing ring. It is highly likely that Tyson Fury wins a one-sided fight since he has all the advantages. Nobody should be under any illusion that this will be competitive but these sort of matches are what draw the most viewers. Fury is at the stage of his career, like Mayweather was against McGregor, where he has accomplished enough that he can just decide to choose the most lucrative opportunities instead of taking a greater risk against real contenders. Despite the objection by fighters like Usyk, I am certain he would immediately accept if he were given the same opportunity to fight an MMA fighter for tens of millions of dollars.
